5 // Test declaration
6 TEST(HTTPDownloaderTestSuite, urlValidCase) {
7  HTTPDownloader downloader;
8  bool success = 1;
9  bool result;
10  std::string s;
11  std::vector<std::string> addresses = downloader.get_urls_from_file("data/invalid_urls.txt");
12  for (std::string i : addresses)
13  {
14  try {
15  s = downloader.download(i, result);
16  }
17  catch(...) {
18  success = 0;
19  }
20  }
21  if(result)
22  {
23  std::cerr << "Libcurl error code " << result << " : " << s << std::endl;
24  }
25  EXPECT_TRUE(success);
26  EXPECT_EQ(0, result);
27 }
28 
29 TEST(HTTPDownloaderTestSuite, urlInvalidCase) {
30  HTTPDownloader downloader;
31  bool success = 1;
32  bool result;
33  std::string s;
34  std::vector<std::string> addresses = downloader.get_urls_from_file("data/invalid_urls.txt");
35  for (std::string i : addresses)
36  {
37  try {
38  s = downloader.download(i, result);
39  }
40  catch(...) {
41  success = 0;
42  }
43  }
44  if(result)
45  {
46  std::cerr << "Libcurl error code " << result << " : " << s << std::endl;
47  }
48  EXPECT_TRUE(success);
49  EXPECT_NE(0, result);
50 }
